name: Addition Frog
description:
Addition Frog is here! 

You play as Turbet, and he is no ordinary frog!  
 
His diet must consist of getting the correct answers for maths equations, or else he'll kick-the-bucket! Getting the correct answer will expand his lifespan, adding seconds to the clock.
Adjust the game's settings to your level in the 'Options' menu.
Get that brain ticking, and GOOD LUCK!
